Package GUI

Class CellSocietyPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.CellSocietyPane
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellSocietyGridPane, Grapher, Simulation
    public abstract class CellSocietyPane
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    riley This is the most abstract class of all UI features. It is a pane that is exnteds features useful to this application. use this class as an extension to any other classes that would require to be show graphically. It depends on the cell society pane class. For example, this class is used as an extension to the cell society grid pane.
